name: Myth Online
storyline:
Presentation / Introduction of the world: 
 
“For ages, war between the Gods has plagued humanity. An endless struggle to decide who is the only and true God. Conflict that almost destroyed the world in the Eternal Cataclysm. In order to prevent existence itself from ceasing to exist, a Truce was signed by the remaining Divine Pantheons. Handing the fate of war into the hands of Heroes who will be summoned from other planes of existence. ” 
  
How is the world now: 
 
“Hundreds of years after the Cataclysm, the world is stabilizing in a current of peace and conflict. Wars are fought by the Heroes summoned in the name of the Four Great Divine Pantheons. Thus existence is no longer in danger of being erased by the hands of the Gods and their mystical creatures. But by the invading shadows of other worlds they try to claim the Throne of One and True God. New problems arise with hungry demons who do not want to lose their source of food - humanity. ” 
 
Main objective: 
 
“For those born into this world, there is only the option to survive. Only Heroes have the power to put an end to Eternal Conflict. They will be the forerunners of a new world or the executioners who will destroy existence itself. ”
summary: Myth Online is an MMORPG inspired by Celtic, Egyptian, Greek and Nordic mythologies, with an addictive PVP, daily guild wars, in addition to an excellent item creation and upgrade system. The game has 4 class being possible to choose between 3 sub class.
